TEXT.S:
iga-semilaway a panan,2002 (Blue Gate Crossing), 2002
u sakamu nu Hulam:Blue Gate Crossing20022002""235002000 <semilaway a panan>Amilika:Blue Gate Crossing2002 a mihcan, namitudud tina iga ni Yiceyan nu Taywan a tademaw. namaala 2002 a mihcan Kanchen iga a lisin "patuduay a lipay"patahkal, atu saka26 Hong Kong iga Cingsiang kawlah pangangan. matabesiw 5000 a mang kalisiw pacakay tu paya' i Taywan. caay kayadah mahiniay kapahay a iga i Taywan capi 2000 a mihcaan.
siwkay nu iga <Hulam a siwkay> <Sakizaya a belih>ci Mong-kerou atu ci Lin-yuecen u kaput nu malecaday a cacudadan. kasasukapah ku heni, mahiza ku calekakaan, yadah ku sakamuan.
u lacul haca caay kaladaytu kami,
caay sakamu caaytu kaidih tisuwanan.
(sapuelac nu Amilika: Just because we can't be together, doesn't mean I will stop loving you.) u namiasipay a tigami, liyad nu lacul sakamusa: : u micudaday i tabakiaya a cacudadan kaku,
naazih tu sulitan namu sa, izawtu ku sakauzip nu maku,
maydih kaku pasimel cacay a kawaw nu maku, cayay henay pasubana' tu taw,
haca taneng tuway masulul tu binawlan,
uyzasa, caay katineng kaku caay patahkal ku kamu i balucu'an.
u homo kaku,
kunizateng kaku, amiliyas ku tademaw tu kaku namusakamu tuway sa,
amicumud tabakiaya a cacudadan, izawtu ku sakapahay a cabay kaku,
matineng ciniza, mangaleb manamuh cinizaan,
caay kaku matineng u homo ciniza,
sisa, panutek kaku pacabay kapahtu.
caay katenes, simamidang tu ciniza,
kunizateng nu maku sa, kapahay a tademaw kya taw,
masitungus tu tina tatusaay,
